entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023
